item.description: Join us from 6p.m.-8p.m. to share how you are increasing your awareness and utilizing L.O.A. in your life. What changes are you making to create a life of joy and ease? If you respond yes and find you no longer can attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. Looking forward to seeing everyone. Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the back room.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: P.M. L.O.A. Meetup
